plot: Jade, 14, falls for Raz, 26, only to discover her dream 'loverboy' has entrapped her in a dangerous world of sex trafficking and exploitation.
title: My Dangerous Loverboy
plot_es: Jade, 14, falls for Raz, 26, only to discover her dream 'loverboy' has entrapped her in a dangerous world of sex trafficking and exploitation.
plot_en: Jade, 14, falls for Raz, 26, only to discover her dream 'loverboy' has entrapped her in a dangerous world of sex trafficking and exploitation.
